SA01n789:4: yaśca sattvaloko yaśca bhājanalokaḥ karmakleśajanitaḥ karmakleśādhipateya ityābhyāṃ tayoḥ sattvabhājanaloka yorduḥkhatvakāraṇaṃ jñāpayati ||
SA01n789:5: api khalu jātirduḥkhamityevamādi pūrva samasya duḥkhasatyalakṣaṇaṃ vyutpādyādhunā duḥkhasatyamārabhya sūtroktasya nirdeśasyārtha vibhaktumārabhate ||
SA01n789:6: jātirduḥkhaṃ saṃvādaduḥkhatāṃ tadanyadukhasvāśrayatāṃ copādāyeti mātuḥ kukṣāvāmapakvāśa yayo rantarā le āsīnasya niṣkrāmato vā kukṣervividhāśucidravyāsaṃpīḍāṅgasaṃmarda duḥkhānubhavanārthena,
SA01n789:8: ṣaṭ samānānya ṣṭau bhavanti vipariṇatidukhaṃ tridhā kṛtvā ||
SA01n789:11: pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkha mityane na saṃskāra duḥkhatāparidīpanavacanaṃ dvayāvinirmokṣānityetā nubandhayogakṣemārthena ||
SA01n789:19: tatpuna rasallakṣaṇaṃ yathā nāsti sarvadā duḥkhasatyamā[tmā]tmoyasvabhāvamiti yo'rthaḥ so'rtho'nityaṃ duḥkhasatyamiti |
SA01n789:23: viyogalakṣaṇaṃ tadavastheṣveva vastuṣu svabhāvavaśitvabhraṃśaḥ kvacitparaiḥ svīkaraṇamapi veditavyam |
SA01n789:28: vyādhi jarāmaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ dhātuvaiṣamyaṃ khalityādikaṃ sthitikālāvedho payogaśca |
SA01n789:33: prathamadvitīyatṛtīyadhyānasthānāvasāne lokasaṃniveśe saṃvṛtte tadūrdhva yānyavaśiṣyante dvitīyatṛtīyacaturthadhyānasyānāntarāṇi tāni tāsāṃ śīrṣāṇi veditavyāni |
SA01n789:36: taireva tu sarvairjāyamānaiḥ saha tāni vimānāni nirvartante cyavamānaiḥ saha
SA01n789:46: tasminnāyatane upapadyāparaparyāyavedanīyakarmaṇa upayuktatvādabhāvādvā tatra rbhūyo'nutpattito veditavyam ||
SA01n789:56: saṃskārāni tyatāṃ saṃskāra vipariṇāmatāṃ ca saṃdhāyoktam - mayā yatkiṃcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyetyayamaduḥkhāsukhasya sukhasya ca veditasya duḥkha vacane'bhisaṃdhirveditavyaḥ |
SA01n789:57: duḥkhasya tu veditasya duḥkhatvena prasiddhatvālloke na tatra punarabhisaṃdhirucyata iti |
SA01n789:58: yeṣu cānityeṣu saṃskāreṣu jātyādikaṃ prajñāyate[teṣām] anityatvāt duḥkhamityabhisaṃdhirveditavyaḥ |
SA01n789:61: teṣāṃ ca saṃskārāṇāṃ nityakālaṃ tadrahitaprakṛtikalakṣaṇasya nairātmyasya bhāvastadubhayaṃ śūnyatetyucyate |
SA01n789:65: tasya yena yena prakāreṇa parikalpyate tena tena prakāreṇābhāvāt |
SA01n789:66: prakṛtiśūnyatā pariniṣpannaṃ sva bhāvamupādāya tasya śūnyatāprakṛtika tvāt ||
SA01n789:69: kṣaṇikalakṣaṇā tu na prasiddhā sarvasaṃskārāṇāmataḥ sā prasādhayitavyā |
SA01n789:70: tatra cittacaitasikānāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ loke prasiddhamataḥ tenāprasiddhaṃ rūpasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ prasādhyate |
SA01n789:76: tathāhi kāyaḥ savijñānaka eva samudāgacchati vijñānāpakrāntyā ca pūtībhavati |
SA01n789:79: cittasya hi [vi]kāreṇa kāyasya vikāro dṛśyate sukhaduḥkharāgadveṣādyavasthāsu |
SA01n789:80: ataḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ vikāriṇaścetaso'nuvidhānāt kāyasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ siddham |
SA01n789:82: cittasya hi sendriyaḥ kāya āśrayaḥ prasiddhaḥ,
SA01n789:83: yasya ca ya utpatyāśrayo nāsau svavināśamantareṇa tasyāśrayī bhava ndṛṣṭaḥ |
SA01n789:88: ataḥ kāraṇasya kṣaṇikatvātkāryasya kṣaṇi katvaṃ veditavyam,
SA01n789:89: ye hetavo ye pratyayāḥ rūpasyātpādāya te'pyanityāḥ,
SA01n789:90: anityān khalu hetupratyayān pratītyotpannaṃ rūpaṃ kuto nityaṃ bhaviṣyatīti sūtrapadānusāreṇa |
SA01n789:92: prabhāvaviśiṣṭasya ca cittasya rūpaṃ vaśe vartate,
SA01n789:96: na hi pratikṣaṇaprakṛtivikāritāmantareṇākasmiko rūpasyānte vikāro yuktaḥ ,
SA01n789:101: ataḥ pratyayāntaranirapekṣo'vaśyaṃbhāvī vināśa utpannamātrasyaiva bhāvasya na bhavati paścādbhatīti [na] kiṃcidviśeṣaṇamasti |
SA01n789:108: asti sarvabhūtikaḥ sa evārdra uṣṇaśca mṛtpiṇḍo gamanāvasthāyāmiti |
SA01n789:116: itya[nya] trāpi yadyatropalabhyate bhūtaṃ bhautikaṃ vā tatra tadastīti veditavyaṃ nānyatra |
SA01n789:117: niḥ śarīraḥ paramāṇu riti niḥsvabhāvo vyavasthānamātramityarthaḥ,
SA01n789:119: buddhyā paryantabhedatastu paramāṇu vyavasthānaṃ buddhyā yāvānavayapāpakarṣaparyantaḥ śakyate prabhettuṃ tāvatā paramāṇu vyavasthānaṃ kriyate |
SA01n789:120: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ yadevaṃ niḥśarīro'pi paramāṇurvyavasthāpyate |
SA01n789:122: avayavaśo hi buddhyā bhidyamāne rūpe sarvametadekaṃ rūpamiti piṇḍasaṃjñā vigacchati,
SA01n789:125: evaṃ hi buddhyā bhidyamānaṃ rūpaṃ na kiṃcidbhavatīti matvā rūpadravyasyāpariniṣpattiṃ praviśati,
SA01n789:128: sarvaduḥkhatāgatiyoniprabhāvitatvāt kāmadhātoranupacittakuśalamūlatvenānāvṛtaṃ sarvagatigamanatvācca yathākramaṃ tadvipulamasaṃlikhitaṃ ca veditavyam saṃlikhitaṃ tadevotpannamokṣabhāgīyānām,
SA01n789:137: gandharvo gandhenārvaṇāt gandhānusāreṇo papattideśa [ga] manā dityarthaḥ |
SA01n789:138: paraṃ saptāhaṃ tiṣṭhatya ntareṇa ca cyavate yadyupapattipratyayāna labhate |
SA01n789:139: atha na labhate saptāhātpareṇa cyutvā punarantarābhava eva nivartate |
SA01n789:140: evaṃ yāva [t] saptakṛtvaḥ tataḥ pareṇa ekadā ca vyāvartate yadi tadavasthā syādyatropapattipratya[ya] balavanta āmukhībhūtā bhavanti caturthadhyānalābhino'rhattvābhimānino bhikṣostadbhūmikāntarābhavābhinirvṛttau mokṣāpavādi kamithyādṛṣṭipratilambhānnārakāntarābhavābhi nirvṛttivat |
SA01n789:143: sabhāgāṃśca sattvānpaśyati yaiḥ saha pūrva tatkuśalamakuśalaṃ vā caritaṃ bhavati taiḥ saha vartamānamātmānaṃ svapna iva saṃjānīte |
SA01n789:145: tata ūrdhvamindriyābhinirvṛttiryathā pratītyasamutpāda iti nāmarūpādyānupūrvyā | yathoktam -
SA01n789:147: arbudājjāyate peśī peśī to jāyate dhanam ||
SA01n789:152: kleśāḥ kleśādhipateyaṃ ca karma iti sāsravamityarthaḥ |
SA01n789:153: yadyevaṃ kimartha bhagavatā tṛṣṇaiva samudaya nirdeśe nirdiṣṭā |
SA01n789:167: ālayavijñānaṃ viśeṣeṇa saṃskāraduḥkhatāvasthaṃ tatra cātmasaṃmohasukhena tṛṣṇā pravṛttā veditavyā |
SA01n789:178: dṛṣṭeḥ prañcākāro bhedaḥ - satkāyadṛṣṭirantagrāhadṛṣṭimithyādṛṣṭiḥ dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśa iti ||
SA01n789:180: sā punaḥ ṣaḍākārā tadyathā vikṣepāpraśāntatā viparyāsāpraśāntatā auddhatyāpraśāntatā styāna middhāpraśāntatā pramādāpraśāntatā'lajjāpraśāntatā ca ||
SA01n789:183: tatra cāyo niśomanaskāraḥ pratyavasthito bhavatīti tasminviṣaye śubhanimittādyudgrāhako rāgādyutpattyanukūlaḥ ||
SA01n789:184: avidyā dṛṣṭivicikitsā ūrdhvabhūmyālaṃvanā api santi na punarāsāṃ sā bhūmiḥ sākṣādālaṃvanaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā svabhūmiḥ,
SA01n789:188: na hi parabhūmikān saṃskārānahamityabhiniviśamāno dṛṣṭa iti |
SA01n789:193: tat parikalpitaṃ tvasyālaṃvanamiti vaktavye tatparikalpastvasyālaṃvanamiti vacanam,
SA01n789:200: pratigho mānena dṛṣṭyā ca na saṃprayujyate,
SA01n789:201: na hi yo yatra vastuni pratihatastena sa unnatiṃ gacchati tadvā saṃtīrayituṃ śaknotīti,
SA01n789:203: krodhādaya anyonyaṃ na saṃprayujyanta iti viruddhā viruddhairna saṃ[pra]yujyante |
SA01n789:210: yadyena prakāreṇa yasmin vastuni saṃprayojayati tannirdeśena saṃyojananirdeśo veditavyaḥ |
SA01n789:220: dṛṣṭisaṃyojanena saṃprayukto mithyāni saraṇaṃ paryeṣata ityaha mokṣo mama mokṣo muktaśca nityo bhaviṣyāsyu cchetsyāmi veti,
SA01n789:223: āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārga hitvā satkāyadṛṣṭayā tatpūrvakeṇa ca śīlavratena śuddhipratyayanāt ||
SA01n789:225: bāhyena hi bandhanena vaddho dvayaṃ na labhate - gantuṃ ca na labhate,
SA01n789:230: mithyā mokṣaṃ mokṣopāyaṃ ca santīrayantīti yathākramaṃ tisṛbhirdṛṣṭibhirdvābhyāṃ ca parāmarśābhyāṃ yathā saṃyojaneṣūktamiti ||
SA01n789:231: ṣaḍ rāgādīn kleśān sthāpayitvā tadanyaḥ kliṣṭa ścaitasikaḥ saṃskāraskandhaḥ krodhādiko veditavyaḥ |
SA01n789:232: kuśalapakṣāntarāyāya yogināṃ punaḥpunaruddhegena cittaṃ paryavanahyantīti paryavasthānāni |
SA01n789:233: kuśalapakṣaḥ punaryathākālaṃ śamathapragrahopekṣānimittabhāvanā tatsaṃniśrayaśca brahmacaryādiśuddhisaṃgṛhītaṃ śīlam |
SA01n789:252: abhidhyādayaḥ kāyagranthā iti na rūpakāyasyaitte granthā veditavyāḥ kiṃtarhi samāhitacittasvabhāvasya kāyasya parigranthārthena granthāḥ |
SA01n789:253: pṛthagdṛṣṭisaṃniśrayeṇedameva satyaṃ moghamanyadityabhiniviśya jñeyaṃ saṃtīrayatāmayoniśo jñeyasaṃtīraṇahetoḥ cittaṃ vikṣipyate |
SA01n789:256: kuśalapakṣasyāsaṃprakhyānāya cittaṃ nivṛṇvantīti nivaraṇāni kuśalapravṛtterantarāyaṃ kurvantītyarthaḥ |
SA01n789:268: punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāre jātijarāmaraṇayogena nidhnantīti nighāḥ ||
SA01n789:276: mithyādharmābhiniveśahetoḥ viparītadarśino mohena duścaritaṃ caranti yājñikādaya iti ||
SA01n789:279: ayoniśonimittamanuvyañjanaṃ ca grāhayitvā kāyaṃ cittaṃ ca paridahantīti paridāhāḥ ||
SA01n789:280: rūpādike vastuni ratyadhyavasānaṃ kārayitvā tadvipariṇāme śokādibhiḥ sattvānāyāsantītyu pāyāsāḥ ||
SA01n789:289: rāgo viṣaye dṛṣṭau ca vipratipanna iti bhāvanāprahātavyo darśanaprahātavyaśca yathākramam |
SA01n789:290: śubhatā mātrālaṃbanatvādrāgasya yo'pi sattveṣu rāgaḥ so'pi viṣayamukhenaṃva vipratipanno veditavyaḥ |
SA01n789:291: evaṃ pratikūlamātrālaṃbanatvāt pratighasya sattveṣvapi pravartamāno viṣayamukhenaiva vipratipanno veditavyaḥ ||
SA01n789:292: mānaḥ sattveṣu dṛṣṭau ca [vi] pratipannaḥ hīnādasmi śreyānityevamādyākārapravṛttatvātsatveṣu vipratipanno veditavyaḥ |
SA01n789:294: śīlavrataparāmarśādiḥ dṛṣṭau vipratipannaḥ dṛṣṭidoṣeṇaiva śīlavratasya śuddhitaḥ parāmarśanāt |
SA01n789:299: nirodhe mārge cottrāsasaṃjananato vipratipannāḥ kleśavaśātsaṃsāre'bhiratasya vyavadānataḥ prapātasaṃjñātrāsāt |
SA01n789:300: viparītakalpanataśca nirodhe mārge ca vipratipannā draṣṭavyāḥ,
SA01n789:309: sarva upekṣayā pūrvavat sukhasaumanasyābhyāṃ na saṃprayujyate,
SA01n789:318: yā parivṛttāśrayasya parivṛttivijñānāśritā cittatuṣṭiḥ cittaudvilyaṃ cittaharṣaḥ cittakalpatā sātaṃ veditaṃ vedanāgatam |
SA01n789:320: yatparivṛttāśrayasyālayavijñānāśrita āśrayānugrahata āśrayahlādaḥ sātaṃ veditaṃ vedanāgatamiti |
SA01n789:322: sukhā vedanā prathamadvitīyayordhyānayorutpadyamānā yena cittacaitakalāpena saṃprayujyate taṃ ca harṣākāreṇa prīṇayati,
SA01n789:324: atastadubhayakṛtyakaratvādubhayathaivāsyā vyavasthānaṃ veditavyaṃ prītiḥ sukhaṃ ceti |
SA01n789:325: tasmāttayā saṃprayujyamāno mānaḥ sukhena saumanasyena ca saṃprayujyata ityucyate |
SA01n789:326: mithyādṛṣṭiḥ kāmadhātau daurmanasyena saumanasyena ca saṃprayujyate,
SA01n789:330: vicikitsā kāmadhātau sauma nasyena na saṃprayujyate,
SA01n789:332: rūpadhātau vicikitsottaradhyāyināmapi prītisukhaṃ samādhivalādhānenānuvartata eveti tatra sukhasaumanasyābhyāmapi saṃprayujyate ||
SA01n789:333: āveṇikāyā apyavidyāyā eṣa eva nayo draṣṭavyaḥ sukha saumanasyābhyāṃ saṃprayogāsaṃprayogamārabhya ||
SA01n789:334: sarvakleśā upe kṣayā saṃprayujyante audāsīnyamāgamyāstagamanatāmupādāyeti kleśapravandhasya mandataratamatāgamanenoparatavegasyoparamaṇādante'vaśyamaudāsīnyamukhenopekṣāyāḥ saṃprayogo veditavyaḥ ||
SA01n789:339: kāmadhatau daśa dukhadarśanaprahātavyā iti ye tatra tannidānapadasthānato vipratipannāḥ |
SA01n789:340: evaṃ samudayādiṣu yathāyogaṃ vipratipannāstaddarśanaprahātavyā iti veditavyāḥ |
SA01n789:341: kiṃ khalu ye yadālaṃbanāste tatra vipratipannā iti veditavyāḥ |
SA01n789:347: yathoktam -“ nāhamāyuṣmandāsakemān pañcopādānaskandhānātmata [ā]tmīyato vā samanupaśyāmyapi tvasti me eṣu pañcasūpādānaskandheṣvasmīti māno'smīti chando'smītyanuśayo'prahīṇo'parijñāto'nirodhito'vāntīkṛta iti |
SA01n789:348: yathā kliṣṭasya dhātrīcailasyoṣādibhiḥ sudhautasya nirmalasyāpi satastadadhivāsanākṛtaṃ gandhamātramanuvartate yattatsugandhadravyaparibhāvanayā bhūyo'pyapanetavyaṃ bhavatyevameva darśanamārgeṇa prahīṇaparikalpitasatkāyadṛṣṭimalasyāpyāryaśrāvakasya pūrvābhiniveśābhyāsakṛtamaparicchinnavastukamātmadarśanamanuvartate yattatpunarmārgabhāvanayā prahātavyaṃ bhavatīti |
SA01n789:350: yayā nirvāṇāt pratyudāvartate mānasaṃ paritrasanamupādāyātha kastarhi me ātmeti |
SA01n789:353: svabhāvaparijñānaṃ kleśa eṣa utpannaḥ cittasaṃkleśātmaka iti |
SA01n789:355: dṛṣṭadhāmikamavadyaṃ prasavati sāṃparāyikaṃ dṛṣṭadharmasāṃparāyikamavadyaṃ prasavati tajjaṃ caitasikaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ityevaṃ tribhiḥ prakāraiḥ parijñāyotpannaḥ kleśo 'nadhivāsanayogena parivarjyate |
SA01n789:358: yadi sarvadharmā anātmana iti nairātmyajñānenaiva kleśaprahāṇaṃ bhavatyanityādyākārāḥ kimarthamupadiśyante |
SA01n789:363: ānuttaryāṇyārabhya trīṇyānuttaryāṇi - jñānānuttarya pratipadānuttarya vimuktyānuttayai ca |
SA01n789:370: etāni ca trīṇyānuttaryāṇi yathākramaṃ darśana bhāvanāniṣṭhā mārgānadhikṛtya veditavyāni ||
SA01n789:372: kāritrakarma pṛthivyādīnāṃ dhāraṇādi yadvā yasya svalakṣaṇakṛtyam |
SA01n789:377: asmiṃstvarthe yadbhūyasyā vyavasā karmābhipretamiti prāpti kāritrakarmaṇorapi saṃbhavāt ||
SA01n789:378: kāyādikarma karmapathā iti sūtrānusāreṇa yathāpradhānaṃ nirdeśo veditavyaḥ,
SA01n789:381: prāṇātipātādīnāṃ vastu sattvasaṃkhyātamasattvasaṃkhyātaṃ vā yathāyogaṃ yadadhiṣṭhāya prāṇātipātādayaḥ pravartante |
SA01n789:385: niṣṭhāgamanaṃ tena tena prayogeṇa tasya tasya karmaṇaḥ paripūraṇaṃ tatkālamūrdhvakālaṃ vā ||
SA01n789:390: niṣṭhāgamanaṃ tasya prāṇinastena prayogeṇānantaraṃ praścādvā maraṇam ||
SA01n789:391: adattādānādonāṃ vastu ca niṣṭhāgamanaṃ ca nirdhekṣyāmaḥ |
SA01n789:393: adattādānasya vastu paraparigṛhītaṃ sattvasaṃkhyātama sattvasaṃkhyātaṃ vā |
SA01n789:395: kāmamithyācārasya vastvagamyā strī gamyā vānaṅgādeśākāle vamātrāyuktābhyāṃ ca sarvaśca pumātrapuṃsakaṃ ca |
SA01n789:397: mṛṣāvādasya vastu dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mataṃ vijñātamadṛṣṭamaśrutamamatamavijñātaṃ ca |
SA01n789:417: parasaṃjñaptisaṃcetanīyatā yathā kaścidanicchanniva paraiḥ saṃjñāpyamānaḥ samādāpyamāno hitametaditi grāhyamāṇo'bhisaṃghāyā kuśalamācarati |
SA01n789:419: mūlābhiniveśasaṃceta nīyatā yathā kaścidkuśalamūlaiḥ lobhādibhirabhibhūta āviṣṭacittastīvreṇābhini veśenābhisaṃghāyākuśalamā carati |
SA01n789:420: viparyāsasaṃcetanīyatā yathā kaściddharmakāmo viṣamahetudṛṣṭi rāyatyāmiṣṭaphalārthamabhisaṃdhāyā kuśalamā carati |
SA01n789:421: tatra pūrvikābhistisṛbhiḥ saṃcetanīyatābhiḥ kṛtamapi karma naivopacīyate yato'sya nāvaśyaṃ vipākaḥ pratisaṃvedanīyaḥ |
SA01n789:422: paścimābhyāṃ tu saṃcetanīyābhyāṃ yadi kṛtaṃ bhavatyupacitaṃ cāvaśyamevāsya vipākaḥ pratisaṃvedyate |
SA01n789:425: yadasmin janmanyanenedaṃ karma karaṇīyamiti sa tamavadhi malaṃghayitvā tatkarma karoti,
SA01n789:426: yasyākaraṇāya pratibandhaṃ buddhā api bhagavanto na samarthāḥ kartum yathāhetuniyamanaṃ phalasaṃtānapariṇāmāditi |
SA01n789:429: yathānena vipākena dṛṣṭe dharme bhavitavyamanenopa padyānenāparasmin paryāya iti ||
SA01n789:430: aku śalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ mṛdumadhyādhi mātrāṇāṃ vipākaphalaṃ tiryakpretanarakeṣu veditavyam |
SA01n789:433: adhipatiphalaṃ pratyekaṃ tadānurūpyeṇaṃva bāhyānāṃ bhāvānāṃ [sa] syādīnāṃ vipattiḥ |
SA01n789:462: yathā'kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ vipākaphalādi triphalā vasthānaṃ kṛtam,
SA01n789:463: evaṃ kuśalādīnāṃ karmapathānāṃ sāstravāṇāṃ devamanuṣyeṣu trīṇi phalāni yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyāni ||
SA01n789:469: bahubhiḥ karmakṣaṇaiḥ tasyaivaikasya punaḥ punaḥ bījapoṣaṇāt |
SA01n789:473: yathā kāmāvacaramanyagatikamapi paripūrakaṃ kuśalamūlamanyatra vipākaṃ prayacchati,
SA01n789:479: tattvārthasaṃmūḍhasya puṇyāniṃjyā stattvārtha ucyate catvāryāyaṃ satyāni |
SA01n789:480: tatra saṃmohaḥ kuśalacittānāmapyadṛṣṭasatyānāmanuśayato'nubuddho bhavati yadvaśena te duḥkhatastraidhātukasya yathābhūtamaparijñānāt punarbhavahetubhūtān puṇyānijyasaṃskārānutthāpayanti |
SA01n789:490: tadyadi tenaiva vittopakaraṇenārthī bhava[ti]tatsvīkaraṇāyābhisaṃskarotyato'sya lobhena prayogo vyavasthāpyate |
SA01n789:492: atha parasvīkaraṇe na kaściddoṣa iti mohena prayogo veditavyaḥ |
SA01n789:494: anyonyādhipateyamapi karma sādhāraṇaṃ veditavyaṃ yadvaśātsattvā anyonyaṃ citacai ttapariṇāmanimittaṃ bhavantīti ||
SA01n789:497: sarva ca kuśalaṃ karma saṃcetanīyaṃ pratipakṣabalikasyākuśalād balavaddraṣṭavyam |
SA01n789:499: sarva cāviśeṣeṇa kuśalākuśalaṃ niyatavipākamārya mārgeṇāprahīṇaṃ balavadityucyate |
SA01n789:511: tadyathā kṣetrato yadi guṇavaddakṣiṇīyaṃ kṣetraṃ bhavati |
SA01n789:512: vastuno yadi praṇītaṃ prabhūtaṃ deyavastu bhavati |
SA01n789:514: āśrayataḥ puṇyānāṃ kartā yadi vītarāgo bhavati |
SA01n789:518: bahulīkārataḥ yadi paunaḥ punye na kṛtaṃ bhavatyanuvitarkitaṃ vā |
SA01n789:519: bāhujanyato yadi svayaṃ ca kṛtaṃ bhavatyanyaiśca kāritamiti ||
SA01n789:520: ya evaṃ vadet - yathā yathāyaṃ puruṣapudgalaḥ karma karotyupacinoti tathā tathā vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ityevaṃ sati brahmacarya vāso na bhavatyavakā śaśca na prajñāyate samyagduḥkhakṣayāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāyai |
SA01n789:523: yadi tadvipākastathaiva sahaduḥkhena sahadaurmanasyenānubhūyeta vṛthā tatparipālanaṃ syāt |
SA01n789:524: pāradārikaprabhṛtīnāṃ ca sahasukhena sahasaumanasyena dauḥ śīlyakaraṇādyadi tadvipākastathaivānubhūyeta vṛthā tadviratiḥ syādityevaṃ kṛtvā brahmacaryavāso na bhavati ||
SA01n789:527: evaṃ ca kṛtvā sukhasahagatasya karmaṇaḥ sukhasahagata eva vipāko duḥkhasahagatasya duḥkhasahagato 'duḥkhāsukhasahagatasya tatsahagata eveti niyamaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ ||
SA01n789:528: atra ya stvevaṃ yathāvedanīyaṃ yathāvedanīyamityevamādinā sukhasahagatasya kuśalākuśalasya yathāyogamāyatyāṃ sukhaduḥkhāduḥkhāsukhavedanīyasya sukhādiko vipāko'nujñātaḥ |
SA01n789:529: evaṃ duḥkhāduḥkhāsukhasahagatasya sukhādive danīyasya sukhādiko vipāko'nujñāyata iti ||
SA01n789:530: pravrajitasya saṃvaraḥ pañcavidho bhikṣusaṃvaro yāvacchāmaṇerīsaṃvara iti |
SA01n789:531: sa duścaritavivekacaritaṃ kāmavivekacaritaṃ ca pudgalamadhikṛtya vyavasthāpitaḥ |
SA01n789:532: tathāhi sa tādṛśaḥ śaknoti yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇātipātāda brahmacaryācca virantumiti |
SA01n789:533: upāsakopāsikāsaṃvaro duścaritaviveka caritamadhikṛtya no tu kāmavivekacaritam |
SA01n789:534: ataḥ evāsya yāvajjīvaṃ kāmamithyā cāraviratirvyavasthāpyate nābrahmacaryaviratiriti |
SA01n789:535: upavāsasaṃvaro naiva duścarita vivekacaritaṃ na kāmavivekacaritam |
SA01n789:540: dhyāna saṃvaro dauḥ śīlyasamutthāpakānāṃ lobhādīnāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ kleśopakleśānā viṣkambhaṇapratipakṣeṇa bījopaghāte sati pradeśa vairāgyeṇāpi kāmebhyo bītarāgasya yā tasmādvauḥ śīlyādviratiḥ |
SA01n789:541: yāvattṛtīyadhyānavītarāgasya dūrībhāvapratipakṣeṇa teṣāmeva dauḥśīlyasamutthāpakānāṃ sularāṃ bījopaghāto veditavyaḥ |
SA01n789:543: aurabhrikā ye paśūn hatvā tadvikrayeṇa jīvikāṃ kalpayanti |
SA01n789:548: abhijanmato vā tatkarmasamādānato veti tatkulīnasyānyakulīnasya ca yathākramam |
SA01n789:550: yathoktasaṃvarāsaṃvaravinirmuktasya dānapriyavacanādikaṃ khaṭacapeṭādikaṃ ca karma navasaṃvaronāsaṃvara ityucyate ||
SA01n789:551: dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma yatra janmani kṛtaṃ tatraiva yadvipacyate |
SA01n789:554: yasya tāvadeka mevānantarya tasya tadvipāko'nantaraṃ yuktaḥ,
SA01n789:561: yasya tatraiva janmani vipāko vipaktumārabhate taddṛṣṭadharmavedanīyam |
SA01n789:563: yasyānantaraṃ janma laghayitvārabhate tadaparaparyāyavedanīyami tyevaṃ ca kṛtvā hācittāvadāne - “ ānantaryasya karmaṇo narake punaḥpunaścyutyupapādena vipākapratisaṃvedanam“ - anulomitaṃ bhavatīti ||
SA01n789:567: kṛṣṇaśuklaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklavipākaṃ yatkāmapratisaṃyuktaṃ vipākaṃ vyāmiśraṃ kuśalākuśalamityarthaḥ |
SA01n789:569: nātra pravṛttikṣaṇanaiyamyenocyate tadevobhayamityapi tu sahāśayaprayogeṇaikaṃ karmetyayamatrābhi saṃdhirvedivyaḥ |
SA01n789:570: tayośca kṛṣṇaśuklatāṃ pratyanyonyāsādṛśye satyekaṃ karma kṛṣṇaśuklaṃ vyavasthāpyate |
SA01n789:571: tatrāśayataḥ kṛṣṇaṃ prayogataḥ śuklaṃ yathāpi kaścitparān vañcayitukāmasteṣāṃ saṃpratyayananimittaṃ bhāvena dānāni dadāti yāvatpravrajatyapi |
SA01n789:572: prayogataḥ kṛṣṇamāśayataḥ śuklaṃ yathāpi kaścitputraṃ vā śiṣyaṃ vā'hitānnivārayitukāmo hite ca niyojayitukāmo'nukampācittaḥ kāyena vācāvā paruṣayā tasminkāle saṃkliśyate ||
SA01n789:573: akṛṣṇaśuklāvipākaṃ karma karmakṣayāya saṃvartate prayogānantarya mārgeṣvanāsravaṃ karma prayogamārgā nantaryamārgāṇāṃ prahāṇapratipakṣatvāt |
SA01n789:577: karmakṣayāya saṃvartate'syaiva kṛṣṇādikasya trividhasya sāsravasya karmaṇastenānāstraveṇa karmaṇā vipākadānavāsanāsamudghātāt ||
SA01n789:578: aviśeṣeṇa ca sarvasyānāsravasya karmaṇaḥ paripanthamānukūlyaṃ svabhāva madhikṛtya vaṃkadoṣakaṣāyāṇāṃ śauceyānāṃ mauneyānāṃ ca yathākramaṃ vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam ||
SA01n789:580: doṣo yena kāyādikarmaṇā dūṣite saṃtāne tattādṛśamāvaraṇabhūtaṃ karmotpadyate |
SA01n789:588: mauneyāni śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ yadanāsravaṃ kāyavāṅmanaḥkarma munīnāṃ tatkarmeti kṛtvā |
SA01n789:589: dānasaṃpadamadhikṛtya dānaṃ dātā bhaviṣyatītya nenābhīkṣṇadānatāṃ darśayati,
SA01n789:595: muktyāgaḥ pratatapāṇirvyavasargarato yāyajūkastyāgasaṃpanno dāna saṃvibhāgarata ityebhiḥ padairyathākramamaniśritadānatādayo veditavyāḥ |
SA01n789:610: mokṣaṃ prati yaḥ saṃvaraḥ sa prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ |
SA01n789:614: pañca bhikṣoragocarāḥ - ghoṣo veśaḥ pānāgāraṃ rājakulaṃ caṇḍālakaṭhinameva pañcamam |
SA01n789:615: prajñaptisāvadyeṣvapi prakṛtisāvadye ṣviva tīvreṇa gauraveṇa śikṣaṇādaṇumātreṣvavadyeṣu bhayadarśī bhavati |
SA01n789:617: ataḥ paraṃ śīlamārabhya yadbhagavatā sūtrāntareṣu nirdiṣṭaṃ kāyena saṃvṛto bhavatītyevamādi tasyārtha ucyate |
SA01n789:618: tatra kāyena vācā saṃvṛto bhavati saṃprajanyaparigṛhītatayā yathanujñātamabhikramapratikramādiṣu buddhipūrva samyagvartanāt |
SA01n789:627: pratirūpakāyavāksamudācāro guruṣu gurusthānīyeṣu ca nihitamānatayā yathārhamupacaraṇāt |
SA01n789:631: avipratisārakāyavāksamudācāraḥ kuśalapakṣamā rabhyālpamātreṇāsaṃtuṣṭasyā vipratisāritayā yāvacchakyaṃ saṃpādanāt ||
SA01n789:636: karmāṇi dāyāya eṣāṃ ta ime karmadāyādāḥ |
SA01n789:638: tasyāṃ svayaṃkṛtavipākapratisaṃvedanāyāṃ kuśalākuśalānāṃ karmaṇāmanyonyadāyā datāmupādāya yathāsvami ṣṭāniṣṭaphalasaṃvibhajanāt |
SA01n789:639: te punaḥ svakṛtakarmeṣṭāniṣṭavipākapratisaṃvedinaḥ sattvāḥ kuta āditaḥ saṃbhūtāḥ kimahetukā āhosvit prakṛtīśvarādihetukā ityāha karmayonīyāḥ |
SA01n789:643: yaduktamacintyaḥ sattvānāṃ karmavipāka iti na sarvaiḥ prakāraiḥ [a] sāvacintyo veditavyaḥ |
SA01n789:647: anena karmaṇā sattvānāmātmabhāvasya varṇasaṃsthānā di prakārabhedavaicitryamityacintyaḥ,
SA01n789:650: [tatra sthānaṃ] yatra pradeśe sthitvā yatkarma kṛtvā grāme vā nagare vetyādi |
SA01n789:655: kīdṛśena khalu karmaṇā kaṇṭakādīnāṃ taikṣṇādikaṃ kṛtamiti lokacintā nantarbhūtatvāt |
SA01n789:665: tadyathā āyurvaśitayā bodhisattvā āyuḥsaṃskārānadhiṣṭhā ya yāvadicchanti tiṣṭhanti |
SA01n789:666: cittavaśitayā yathecchaṃ samādhīn samāpadyante pariṣkāravaśitayā 'prameyamanardheyamupakaraṇavarṣa sattvānāṃ varṣanti |
SA01n789:668: upapatti vaśitayā dhyā nairapi vihṛtyāparihīṇā eva kāmadhātāvupapadyante |
SA01n789:673: dharmavaśitayā yathārha yāvat sarvasatvānāmanyānyairnāmapadavyaṃjanakāryaḥ sūtrādīn dharmān vyavasthāpya yugapaccittaparitoṣaṇe samarthā bhavantīti ||
SA01n789:676: anābhogapratigatā dharmadhātvekarasatāprāptā sarve buddhā bhagavantaḥ sattvānāṃ yathā yadā yāvatkṛtyamanuṣṭhātavyaṃ tatsarvamanutiṣṭhanti evaṃ buddhānāṃ buddhaviṣayo'cintyaḥ ||
SA01n789:678: upacitavāsanānāṃ sattvanāṃ devādisatvanikāye tadākṛtiprakṛtisādṛśyena samasyodayasya kāraṇamiti samudayam |
SA01n789:679: pratyātmaṃsaṃtānanaiyabhyena gatiyonyādisarvaprakāraiḥ prakarṣaṇa yāvadbhavāgragatasyodbhavasya kāraṇamiti prabhavaḥ |
SA01n789:680: apūrva syānyasyātmabhāvasya prāptau pūrvātmabhāvātyayena kāraṇamiti pratyayaḥ ||
SA01n789:704: tadubhayavisaṃyoge punaḥ satyāyatyāṃ ca duḥkhaṃ nirudhyate,
SA01n789:708: atastatphalabhūtasya duḥkhasya prahāṇamadhikṛtyāha - nirodho vyupaśama iti |
SA01n789:709: pūrvakarma kleśasamudāgatānāṃ tu sattvānāṃ svarasenaivoparama[ma]dhikṛtyāha - astaṃgama iti |
SA01n789:733: dukhaṃ hi tatra tatra sattva nikāye pratisaṃdhibandhena jāyate |
SA01n789:736: tacca vartamānaṃ duḥkhaṃ karmakleśānāṃ cānyabhavasaṃskaraṇe padasthānaṃ bhavati |
SA01n789:743: apunarāvartanāt kṣematvācca yathākramaṃ hitaṃ kuśalamiti śakyatvāt ||
SA01n789:748: tatra saṃbhāramārgaḥ śīlādiko yasya paripūrṇatvādu ṣmagatādyānupūrvyā satyadarśanāya tadāvaraṇaprahāṇāya ca saṃtānasya yogyatāṃ pratilabhata iti |
SA01n789:750: uṣmagataṃ pratyātmaṃ satyeṣvālokalabdhaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā sasaṃyoga iti samāhitena cittena satyādhipateyasya sūtrādikasya dharmasya manojalpasya mukhairarthasaṃprakhyāne sati śamathaśca vipaśyanā coṣmagatamiti veditavyam ||
SA01n789:767: tatra duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ prayogamārge duḥkhasatyādhikārikasūtrādidharmavicāraṇājñānaṃ yoniśo manaskārasaṃgṛhītamadhipati kṛtvā svasaṃtānikaduḥkhasatye tattathatāpratyakṣānubhāvino lokottarā prajñā samyagdṛṣṭisvabhāvotpadyate yayā duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyāṃstraidhātukānaṣṭāviṃśatimanuśayān prajahāti |
SA01n789:769: tayā kṣāntyā duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyakleśaprahāṇāt parivartita āśraye tadanantaraṃ yena jñānena tāmāśrayaparivṛtti pratyanubhavati tadduḥkhe dharmajñānamityucyate |
SA01n789:772: atastadālaṃbyānvaya eṣa āryadharmāṇāmiti pratyātmaṃ pratyakṣānubhāvinyanāstravā prajñā duḥkhe anvayajñānakṣānti |
SA01n789:774: lokottarasya hi mārgasya dvayaṃ viṣayaḥ - tathatā samyagjñānaṃ ca |
SA01n789:779: yo bhagavatā ṣaṣṭho'[ni]mittavihārī pudgala ākhyātaḥ sa eteṣu kṣāntijñāneṣu vartamāno veditavyaḥ,
SA01n789:781: ta ete kṣānti [jñāna] saṃgṛhītāḥ ṣoḍaśa cittakṣaṇā darśanamārgaḥ,
SA01n789:783: na cātra bhāvasyābhatvā prādurbhāvamātraṃ cittakṣaṇo veditavyaḥ |
SA01n789:784: kiṃ tarhi yāvatā jñeye jñānātpatteḥ parisamāptirbhavati |
SA01n789:787: yaccaitaddarśanamārgamārabhya vistareṇa vipaṃcittaṃ vyavasthānamātraṃ tatsarva veditavyam,
SA01n789:789: sarvaṃ hi mārgasatyaṃ caturbhiḥ prakārairanugantavyam - vyavasthānato vikalpanato'nubhavataḥ paripūritaśca |
SA01n789:791: yathāsvamadhigamaniṣṭhāprāptā śrāvakādayastatpṛṣṭhalabdhena jñānena pareṣāṃ prāpaṇanimittaṃ nāmapadavyañjanakāyaiḥ mārgasatyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti,
SA01n789:794: abhisamayaprayuktā laukikena yathāvyavasthānaṃ vikalpayato yadabhyasya nti |
SA01n789:796: tathābhyasyanto yāmādito darśanamārgākhyāṃ lokottarāṃ niṣprapañcāvasthāṃ pratyātmamanubhavanti paripūritaḥ tadūrdhva yāmāśrayaparivṛttiṃ paripūrya [yā] vadadhigamaniṣṭhāṃ prāpnuvanti |
SA01n789:798: ityevamādi tacca [tu]rākāraṃ mārgacakraṃ punaḥ punaranyonyāśrayeṇa pravartata iti veditavyam ||
SA01n789:799: yaduktaṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurutpadyata iti taddarśanamārgamadhikṛtyoktam,
SA01n789:805: punaranayoreva kṣāntijñānāvasthayoryathākramaṃ parijñayā prahāṇena ca mārgasya viśuddhatāmadhikṛtya virajo vigatamalaṃ veditavyam ||
SA01n789:817: lokottareṇa mārgeṇa phalādhigame sati dīrgharātramabhikāṃkṣite svādhigame'saṃdehāt |
SA01n789:819: parādhigame tadavasthasyā nyeṣāmapi viśeṣādhigamaṃ prati vimatyabhāvāt |
SA01n789:825: te punardhyānārūpyāḥ saṃkleśato vyavadānato vyavasthānato viśuddhitaśca veditavyāḥ ||
SA01n789:836: tattvā prativedhena mokṣakāmasya tasminvi śeṣādhigame mokṣo na mokṣa iti vicikitsotpādanāt ||
SA01n789:838: śuddhakā dhyānārūpyā laukikā api kuśalatvātparya vasthānamalāpagatatvena vyavadātā ityucyante ||
SA01n789:854: prītisukhe cittaikāgratā ca śeṣe aṅge pūrvavat |
SA01n789:855: tṛtīye dhyāne upekṣā smṛtiḥ saṃprajanyaśca pratipakṣāṅgam ,
SA01n789:857: sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā ca śeṣe aṅge yathākramam |
SA01n789:862: kathaṃ punaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānasya sapta manaskārā bhavanti |
SA01n789:867: tadurdhva śrutaṃ cintāṃ cātikramyaikāntena bhāvanākāreṇa tadaudārikaśāntalakṣaṇanimittālaṃbanāṃ śamathavipaśyanāṃ bhāvayan punaḥ punaryathāparyeṣitā maudārikaśāntatāmadhimucyate ityayama dhimokṣikaḥ |
SA01n789:870: sa yogī tadūrdhva prahāṇārāmo bhavati prahāṇe 'nuśaṃsadarśī parīttapravivekaprītisukhasaṃspṛṣṭaḥ kālena kālaṃ prasadanīyena manaskāreṇa saṃpraharṣayati yāvadeva styānamiddhauddhatyopaśamāya |
SA01n789:872: tasyaivaṃ samyakprayuktasya kuśalapakṣaprayogopastabdhatvāt kāmāvacarakleśaparyavasthānāsamudācāre sati tatprahīṇāprahīṇatāvagamārtha tadutpattyanukūlaśubhanimittamanaskāreṇa pratyavekṣaṇaṃ mīmāṃsāmanaskāraḥ |
SA01n789:873: tasyaivaṃ mīmāṃsāpratipakṣaṃ bhāvayataḥ tāvatkālikayogena sarvakāmāvacarakleśavisaṃyogāya prathamadhyānaprayogaparyavasānagataḥ pratipakṣamanaskāraḥ prayoganiṣṭhaḥ |
SA01n789:875: tatra lakṣaṇapratisavedinā prahātavyaṃ prāptavyaṃ ca samyakparijñāya prahāṇāya prāptaye ca cittaṃ praṇighatte |
SA01n789:881: prayoganiṣṭhāphalena eṣāṃ manaskārāṇāṃ subhāvitānāṃ bhāvanāphalaṃ pratyanubhavati |
SA01n789:882: yathā prathamadhyāna samāpattaye sapta manaskārā evaṃ yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattaye yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyāḥ |
SA01n789:883: audārikalakṣaṇaṃ punaḥ sarvāsvadhobhūmiṣu yāvadākiṃcanyāyatanāt samāsena dvividhaṃ veditavyam - duḥkhataravihāritā'praśāntavihāritayā,
SA01n789:887: tadyathā brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā mahābrahmāṇaṃ ityevamādi yathāpūrvamuktam |
SA01n789:891: saṃjñākaraṇavyavasthānaṃ caturthadhyānaprabhedā nāṃ samādhīnāmasaṃkhyeyānyacintyāni ca nāmāni |
SA01n789:892: tathāhi yāvataḥ prathamadhyānasaṃgṛhītān samādhīn buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvāśca mahāprabhāvaprāptāḥ samāpadyante,
SA01n789:893: teṣāṃ samādhīnāṃ śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhāśca nāmānyapi na jānanti |
SA01n789:900: lokottaramārgo bhāvanāmārge'ṣṭau duḥkhā[didharmā] nvayajñānāni yathā darśanamārge nirdiṣṭāni |
SA01n789:903: ata eva ca tatsaṃjñāmāndyādālambanā nimittīkaraṇārthenānimitta mityucyate |
SA01n789:904: kutaḥ punaretat jñāyate naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatane āryamārgo nāstīti |
SA01n789:909: pūrvotpāditāyāḥ paścātsaṃmukhobhāvo manuṣyeṣu vā tasminneva janmani rūpadhātau vā upapadya |
SA01n789:912: ata evātra catuṣkoṭikaṃ bhavati - yo rūpavītarāgaḥ sarvaḥ sa ārūpyaśāntavimokṣasamāpattā,
SA01n789:913: yo vā ārūpya śāntavimokṣasamāpattā sarvaḥ sa rūpavītarāga iti |
SA01n789:915: dvitīyā koṭiḥ - caturthadhyānalābhī ārya āryo papattyā'narthī prahāṇamārga nirākṛtya viśeṣamārga niśrityārūpyaśāntavimokṣasamāpattā |
SA01n789:916: tṛtīyā koṭiḥ - sa eva vairāgyārthī prahāṇamārga niśrityārūpyaśāntavimokṣasamāpattā |
SA01n789:919: śāntena vihāreṇa vihartukāmā āryā manuṣyeṣvenāmabhinirhṛtya saṃmukhīkurvanti |
SA01n789:920: ārūpyeṣu tūpapannāste'praya tnenaiva vaipākikaiḥ paramaśāntaiḥ vimokṣavihārairviharantītyatastatsaṃmukhīkaraṇārtha na punaḥ prayatnamārabhanta iti ||
SA01n789:921: mṛdumadhyādhimātro mārgaḥ pratyekaṃ punaḥ mṛdvādibhistribhiḥ prakārairbhittvā navaprakāro vyavasthāpyate,
SA01n789:923: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ mṛdumṛdunā mārgeṇādhimātraḥ kleśaḥ prahīyate |
SA01n789:924: sa hyatyarthaḥ vipannahrīvyapannāpyā lajjinaḥ saṃtāne samudācarati sūpalakṣaścāsau suparicchedastasmādasau sthūlamalavadalpenā pi pratipakṣeṇāpanīyate |
SA01n789:925: yastvayaṃ duṣparicchedasamudācāraḥ sūkṣmalīnaḥ saṃtāne mṛdumṛdukleśaḥ sūkṣmamalavanmahatā pratipakṣabale nāpanīyata ityado vipakṣaprakāraviparyayeṇa pratipakṣaprakāravyavasthānaṃ veditavyam ||
SA01n789:926: prayogamārgo yena mārgeṇa bhāvyamānena pratyekamadhimātrādhimātrādikleśaprakārādijātipakṣasya dauṣṭhulyāṅgasyāpagamātkrameṇāśrayaḥ parivartate sa bhāvanāmārge prayogamārge ityucyate ||
SA01n789:927: yasya tvanantaraṃ tatprakārakleśajātitatpakṣadauṣṭhulyā vaśeṣāpagamāttena dauṣṭhulyena nirdauṭhulya āśrayaḥ parivartate sa ānantaryamārgaḥ ||
SA01n789:930: aparaḥ paryāya'viśeṣamārga stasya kleśaprahāṇaprayogamadhyupekṣya sūtrādīn dharmāścintayataḥ,
SA01n789:931: pūrvacintitādhigatadharmapratyavekṣaṇāvihāreṇa vā viharataḥ samāpattyantaraṃ vā samāpadyamānasya yo mārgaḥ |
SA01n789:932: punarabhijñādīn vaiśeṣikān guṇānabhinirharatastairvā viharato yo mārgaḥ ||
SA01n789:933: ityevaṃ bhāvanāmārga vistareṇa nirdiśya tadanuṣaṃgeṇa mārgabhāvanā varṇyate |
SA01n789:943: aparaḥ paryāyaḥ - mārga utpadyamānaḥ svāṃ vāsanāṃ sthāpayati[sā]dhāsanā pratilambhabhāvanā,
SA01n789:948: punaḥ pratipakṣasya vidūṣaṇādikaḥ caturvidhaḥ prabhedo veditavyaḥ |
SA01n789:974: tatra duḥkhā pratipadanā gamyārūpyaniśritā yathākramaṃ śamathavipaśyanāmāndyāt |
SA01n789:991: punarbodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pañcabhiḥ prakāraiḥ vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam - ālambanataḥ svabhāvataḥ sahāyato bhāvanāto bhāvanāphalataśca ||
SA01n789:992: tatra smṛtyupasthānānāmālaṃbanaṃ yathākramaṃ kāyo vedanā cittaṃ dharmāḥ |
SA01n789:994: yasmādviparyastabuddhayo bālāḥ prāyeṇa sendriyaṃ kāyamāśritya sukhādimupabhuñjānā upalabdha lakṣaṇā ātmarāgādibhiḥ śraddhādibhiśca saṃkliśyante vyavadāyante ceti vikalpayantyata āditaḥ samyaktadvastulakṣaṇaparīkṣārthamevaṃ caturdhālambanavyavasthānaṃ veditavyam ||
SA01n789:1007: kāye kāyasya sādṛśyena paśyanā kāye kāyānupaśyanā,
SA01n789:1009: adhyātmaṃ vedanādayo'dhyātmaṃ kāyamupādāyotpannāḥ cakṣurādyālaṃbanatayā svāśrayotpannanatayā vā |
SA01n789:1016: alpamātrasaṃtuṣṭiḥ alaṃ me tāvatā kuśalapakṣeṇeti prativāraṇam |
SA01n789:1018: nikṣiptadhuratā pramādadoṣeṇa yathārambhaṃ kuśalapakṣaprayogāntā nirvāha iti ||
SA01n789:1027: tathāhi tatpratipakṣabhūtā prastrabdhiḥ kāya eva viśeṣeṇotpadyata iti |
SA01n789:1031: nirātmakaṃ vijñānamātraṃ na bhaviṣyatīti paśyata ātmocchedāśaṅkāmukhena nirvāṇottrāsābhāvāt |
SA01n789:1044: yadā śamathādinimittamanaskāreṇa nirapekṣālaṃbanaṃ kevalaṃ pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayati tadā vyāyaccjhata ityucyate |
SA01n789:1045: yadā tulayopakleśe utpanne tadapakarṣaṇārtha prasadanīyādimanaskāraiḥ cittamunnāmayati,
SA01n789:1046: auddhatyopakleśe cotpanne pratyāsaṃkṣepamukhena cittaṃ dhārayati tadā vīryamārabhata ityucyate |
SA01n789:1055: chandasamādhiryat satkṛtyaprayogamāgamya spṛśati cittasyaikāgratāṃ tīvreṇa chandena tīvre ṇādareṇa prayogaḥ satkṛtyaprayoga iti kṛtvā |
SA01n789:1057: tadvīryamityucyate yannityaṃ prayujyata eva na kadācinna prayujyate |
SA01n789:1058: cittasamādhiryatpūrvajanmāntare samādhibhāvanāmāgamyatatparipuṣṭabījatvāccittasya svarasena samādhyanukūla pariṇāme sati spṛśati cittasyaikāgratām |
SA01n789:1059: api khalu ṛddhipādābhinirhārayornidarśanārthameva samyakprahāṇabhāvanāyāṃ chandaṃ janayatītyevamādinirdeśo veditavyaḥ |
SA01n789:1060: cittaṃ pradadhāti pragṛhṇātītyeṣā cātra pāṭhānupūrvī veditavyā |
SA01n789:1061: tatra cittasamādhiryaccitaṃ pradadhat spṛśatīti pratyātmaṃ cittameva cittaṃ dhārayan śamayannabhisaṃkṣipa nnadhigacchatītyarthaḥ |
SA01n789:1068: tathāhi yo yenārthī bhavati tatprāptyartha vyāyacchate |
SA01n789:1084: etacca yathā kramamadhikṛtyoktaṃ bhagavatā - naca me chando'tilīno bhaviṣyati,
SA01n789:1088: vivṛtena cetasā'paryavanaddhena saprabhāsasahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayiṣyāmi na ca me'ndhakārāyattatvaṃ bhaviṣyati cetasa iti |
SA01n789:1092: phalaṃ tadādhipatyādacireṇa kālena darśanamārgasyotpādaḥ tasminneva ca kāle nirvedhabhāgīyabhajanaṃ ca saṃtānasya ||
SA01n789:1095: tathāhyeṣāṃ tacca yathoktam - āśradvyādivipakṣanirlekhaścādhika ityata evaiṣāṃ tulyānāmālaṃvanasvabhāvādikānāmapyanavamṛdyatārthaviśeṣeṇa bodhipakṣāntaratvam ||
SA01n789:1113: bhāvanā smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritamityevamādirebhiḥ caturbhiḥ padairyathākramaṃ catuḥsatyā laṃbanā bodhyaṅgabhāvanā paridīpitā |
SA01n789:1114: tathāhi duḥkhaṃ duḥkhata ālaṃbamānasya tadvivekānveṣaṇādduḥkhālaṃbanaṃ vivekaniśritamityucyate |
SA01n789:1115: tṛṣṇālakṣaṇaṃ duḥkhasamudayaṃ duḥkhasamudayata ālaṃba mānasya tadvirāgānveṣaṇāttadālaṃbanaṃ virāganiśritam |
SA01n789:1116: duḥkhanirodhaṃ duḥkhanirodhata ālaṃba mānasya tatsākṣātkaraṇānveṣaṇāttadālaṃbanaṃ nirodhaniśritam |
SA01n789:1122: mārgāṅgānāmālaṃbanaṃ darśanamārgāduttarakālaṃ saiva yathādṛṣṭānāṃ satyānāṃ yathābhūtatā |
SA01n789:1131: samyakkarmāntenābhikramapratikramādiṣu saṃpannacāritratayā śīlaviśuddhiḥ samyagā jīvena yathānujñaṃ dharmeṇa cīvarādiparyeṣaṇādājīvaviśuddhi riti |
SA01n789:1141: pratipadāṃ dharmapadānāṃ ca pūrvavadarthanirdeśo veditavyaḥ dukhā pratipadanāgamyārūpyaniśritā yathākramaṃ śamathavipaśyanāmāndhāt |
SA01n789:1146: tasya cittasyaivamādita upanibaddhasya calasyaudārikasya tasminnevālaṃvane saṃtatiyogena sūkṣmokaraṇena cābhisaṃkṣepaḥ saṃsthāpanā |
SA01n789:1148: ādita eva tasya cittasya vahiravisārāyopa sthitasmṛtitopasthāpanā |
SA01n789:1149: pūrvameva vikṣepanimitteṣu rūpādiṣvādīnavasaṃjñāmadhipati kṛtvā cittasya prasarādānaṃ damanam |
SA01n789:1155: tatra carita viśodhanamālaṃvanaṃ kauśalyālaṃbanaṃ vā kleśaviśodhanaṃ vā yāvadbhāvikatayā vicinoti,
SA01n789:1159: api khalu [śamatha]vipaśyanāmāgamya catvāro mārgā iti catvāro mārgopadeśanāmadhikṛtya |
SA01n789:1160: tatra prathamaḥ śamathasya lābhitvādabhiniṣīdanneva cittaṃ sthāpayati yāvatsamādhatte,
SA01n789:1161: vipaśyānāyā alābhitvāttu samādhi niśritya paścātta thāniṣaṇṇastān dharmānvicinoti yāvatparimīmāṃsā māpadyate |
SA01n789:1165: śrutodgrahaṇa mukhena vivaśyanāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti tatpūrvakaṃ ca śamathe |
SA01n789:1167: ajñātamājñā syāmīndriyaṃ prayogamārge nirvedhabhāgīyasaṃgṛhīte pañcadaśasu ca darśanamārgacittakṣaṇeṣu yadindriyam,
SA01n789:1178: ūrdhvabhūmike mārge saṃmukhībhāvena bhāvyamāne'saṃmukhībhūtānyapyadhobhūmi kāni kuśalamūlakāni bhāvanāṃ gacchanti,
SA01n789:1183: tadyathā sarvatragamabhilāpadauṣṭhulyaṃ yā cakṣurādisarvadharmanāmā bhiniveśavāsanā''layavijñāne saṃniviṣṭā'nādikālānusṛtā,
SA01n789:1185: yataścakṣurādayo dharmāḥ sanāmā bhiniveśāḥ punaḥ punaḥ pravartanta iti |
SA01n789:1208: yathoktaṃ - “ tasya cetovimukteḥ pāripūryā prajñāvimukteḥ pāripūryā kāyadauṣṭhulyānāṃ pratiprastrabdheḥ |
SA01n789:1209: smṛtyā samanvāgamahetorevamasya prathamaṃ dvāraṃ sudāntaṃ bhavati suguptaṃ surakṣitaṃ susaṃvṛtaṃ subhāṣitam,
SA01n789:1210: yaduta cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣvevaṃ yāvanmano vijñeyeṣu dharmeṣvi“ ti ||
SA01n789:1212: sa ca samādhirnirantarastatpravāharaya laukikena mārge ṇāntarākhaṇḍanāt |
SA01n789:1216: etadarthapratibimbanārtha bhagavatoktam - tadyathā mahāśailaḥ parvato'khaṇḍo'cchidro'śuṣira ekadhanaḥ susaṃvṛta iti ||
SA01n789:1221: mārgāśrayaparivṛtiḥ pūrva laukiko mārgo'bhisamayakāle lokottaratvena parivṛtaḥ śaikṣaścocyate sā vaśeṣakaraṇīyatvāt |
SA01n789:1222: yadā tu nirhatāśeṣavipakṣo bhavati traidhātukavairāgyāttadāsya mārgasvabhāvasyāśrayasya paripūrṇā parivṛttirvyavasthāpyate |
SA01n789:1224: kṣaye sati, viṣaye vā tasmin yajjñānaṃ kṣaya jñānametaduktaṃ bhavati |
SA01n789:1225: niravaśeṣaṃ prakṣīṇe samudaye yajjñānaṃ tadavasthasya hetunirodhālaṃbanaṃ vā kṣayajñānamiti ||
SA01n789:1226: tathānutpāde sati viṣaye vā tasmin yajjñānamanutpādajñānam āyatyāṃ sarvasya duḥkhasyātyantamanutpattidharmatāyāṃ satyāṃ yajjñānamanyasatyālaṃbanamiti |
SA01n789:1242: viparyayeṇa lokottarāḥ supraviṣṭā nirāvaraṇāśca santo nirvikalpatayā laukikebhyo viśiṣyante |
